questions.question: What is the dominant color of the rice grains visible through the packaging?
What is the apparent shape of the individual rice grains shown?
What kind of packaging material appears to encase the rice?
Describing the overall texture of the rice, is it visibly coarse or fine?
Based on the image, what is the transparency level of the packaging material?
Considering the visual appearance, does the rice seem long-grain or short-grain?
What is the apparent state of the rice inside the packaging; is it loose or compacted?
Does the packaging show any noticeable tears or damage that compromise its integrity?
Is the packaging primarily sealed by a heat-sealed seam or other method?
Does the packaging feature any prominent text apart from the nutrition information?
Judging by its visual appearance, is this packaging resealable in a practical way?
Judging only by the image, what is the approximate weight of the rice shown, in kilograms?
What type of seal is evident at the top of the rice package?
What is the primary language used on the visible package labelling?
Is there any visible branding or logo aside from the nutrition facts?
